View Case Study Frequently Asked Questions What is the difference between multichannel and Omnichannel eCommerce? As the name suggests omnichannel represents omnipresence. It is backed by an approach that unifies multiple channels. Multichannel also means the same but the catch here is that all those channels are managed separately wherein omnichannel ties the channels together to provide unified experiences across channels. Why is Omnichannel eCommerce important? Providing a seamless, frictionless, and unified purchasing experience is the need of the hour, and with omnichannel capabilities, businesses can tap on these possibilities. Today’s savvy consumers expect things and solutions to reach them at the right time, place, and occasion, and omnichannel makes it happen. Is implementing Omnichannel eCommerce expensive? Going omnichannel enables your business to operate and manage database, marketing, inventory, and sales in a more streamlined way. We’d say, every penny invested in omnichannel is worth it! The cost entirely depends on the technology stack your business needs and the kind of advanced capabilities you want to adorn. Get in touch with our experts to discuss this in detail. We hold the expertise and experience to integrate omnichannel commerce for varied industries and requirements - this makes us your go-to omnichannel solution provider.
